{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"5","subject":"Phase 3: Create backend/routers/collection.py + register in main.py","description":"Create new file backend/routers/collection.py with these endpoints:

| Method | Path | Function |
|--------|------|----------|
| POST | /api/collection/jobs | Create job |
| GET | /api/collection/jobs | List jobs |
| GET | /api/collection/jobs/{id} | Job detail + candidates |
| DELETE | /api/collection/jobs/{id} | Delete job |
| POST | /api/collection/jobs/{id}/expand | LLM query expansion |
| POST | /api/collection/jobs/{id}/search | Execute search |
| PUT | /api/collection/candidates/{id}/select | Select candidate |
| PUT | /api/collection/candidates/{id}/deselect | Deselect candidate |
| POST | /api/collection/jobs/{id}/download | Start download of selected |
| GET | /api/collection/jobs/{id}/progress | Download progress |
| POST | /api/collection/jobs/{id}/dedup | Run dedup |

Follow existing router patterns:
- APIRouter(prefix="/api/collection", tags=["collection"])
- Pydantic request models
- get_connection() try/finally close
- dict_from_row / dicts_from_rows for responses
- HTTPException for errors
- BackgroundTasks for download

Also edit backend/main.py to add:
from backend.routers import collection
app.include_router(collection.router)

And add static file mount for collection_cache if needed.","assignedBy":"team-lead","timestamp":"2026-02-10T03:18:38.016Z"}
